bot.name: Agora
global.error.insufficient_perms:
**You are missing the permissions to complete this action.**

_If you believe this is a mistake, please contact server staff!_
perms.feature_embed.desc: Allows users to use the /embed command
perms.feature_create_voice.desc: Allows users to create custom voice channels
perms.feature_create_text.desc: Allows users to create custom text channels
perms.feature_create_unlimited.desc: Allows users to bypass the channel creation limit for the channel creator feature
perms.feature_create_paste_buttons.desc: Allows users to paste buttons for creating voice/text channels into a channel
feature.settings.command.desc: Modify the settings of the different features of this bot

feature.settings.command.channel.max_tex: The maximum amount of text channels a user can create
feature.settings.command.channel.voice_c: The category to put newly created voice channels into
feature.settings.command.channel.text_ca: The category to put newly created text channels into
feature.settings.command.channel.join_to: Add a voice channel that when joined moves every user into their own

feature.embed.command.desc: Allows users to create custom embeds
feature.embed.command.description: Set the description of the embed
feature.embed.command.title: Set the title of the embed
feature.embed.command.title_url: Set the url of the title
feature.embed.command.author: Set the author of the embed

feature.embed.command.author_icon: Set the icon of the author
feature.embed.command.footer: Set the footer of the embed
feature.embed.command.footer_icon: Set the footer icon of the embed
feature.embed.command.image: Set the image of the embed
feature.embed.command.thumbnail: Set the thumbnail of the embed
feature.embed.command.url: Set the url of the embed
feature.embed.command.fields: Add custom fields to the embed - Format: <inline (y/n)>##<title>##<content>; ...
feature.embed.command.color: Set the color of the embed - Format: #RRGGBB
feature.embed.command.timestamp: If set to true, a timestamp will be added
feature.embed.command.links: Add link buttons to the embed - Format: <label>##<link>; ...
